column2:
"No, that was amazing!
Your moves have been burned into my mind.
I'm jealous of what good experience you're gaining!"

"So I guess with an enemy like that, it's
best to evade 'em while striking back
as best you can."

"I'm gonna remember that for future use.
Thanks, friend!"

"いやほんとスゴかったなぁー！
動きがオレの目に焼き付いてるよ。
いい経験を積めてうらやましいぜ！"

"やっぱ、ああいう相手には
上手くいなして適度に攻撃、だな！"

"オレも参考にさせてもらうぜ！
ありがとな！"
